# Changelog

## 0.2.0 (2019-08-26)

* Removed support for Python 3.5

## 0.1.1 (2019-08-23)

  * Added extras_require for aws_lambda

## 0.1.0 (2019-08-22)

  * Add aws lambda handler
  * Clean up code to contain state better (for lambda compatability)

## 0.0.1-dev (2019-07-05)

  * First release on PyPI.
